roleset.name: enjoyment, amusement
roleset.note: FUN-N NOTES: Roleset based on BOLT p01, part 4. (from fun.01-n)
FUN-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5, fun-n.01. (from fun.01-j)

example.name: have_fun-l: all args
example.text: My counsellor had great fun dissecting it and telling me how I'm sexually attracted to mother figures, but he was just an arse.
example.arg: dissecting it and telling me how I'm sexually attracted to mother figures

example.name: fun-j: arg1
example.text: Yes , that could be fun , though I believe Mayor Dave would just mostly ignore her considering his temperment -LRB- even come of us crazy right - wing fanatics like Dave C. -RRB- and knowing what those outside the Progressive Dane club think of Brenda Konkel .
example.arg: though I believe Mayor Dave would just mostly ignore her considering his temperment -LRB- even come of us crazy right - wing fanatics like Dave C. -RRB- and knowing what those outside the Progressive Dane club think of Brenda Konkel

roleset.name: amusing, humorous
roleset.note: FUNNY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, relation to fun-n.01. (from funny.01-j)
FUNNIER-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from funnier.01-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: I don't know why-1 this is so funny to me [*-1].

example.name: concatenation
example.text: Oh well, he-1 was funny to watch [*-1]

example.name: arg1, ADV-attributive
example.text: #yall thought i was being funny about my love for this ship
example.arg: about my love for this ship

roleset.name: odd, possibly suspicious
roleset.note: FUNNY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WordNet. (from funny.02-j)

example.name: funny-j: concatenation, both args
example.text: An older gentleman closing it down said the kitchen was closed but he could make us a Shepherd's Pie. Something was funny to us about that.

example.name: funny-j: empty it, arg1
example.text: Besides , it 's funny how you talk about America like it 's improved lately .
example.arg: how you talk about America like it's improved lately

example.name: funny-j: arg1, ADV-attributive
example.text: And all I'm asking you to do is knock on the damn door and you're being kind of funny about it.
